content: The Startup Track for DevDays 2019 USA is live! Find more details on it here: https://www.devdays.com/us/startup-track

We still have room for startups in the Startup Track at DevDays in June. If you know a startup, are a startup, or starting a startup any time soon, then apply for the Startup Track. Learn FHIR and compete with other startups on the best FHIR-powered app. This is what FHIR was made for folks! Details are here: https://fhirdevdays.com/us/startup for details. Questions? Ask @Vadim Peretokin
Last call! May 1 is the application deadline for the HL7 FHIR DevDays Startup Track. Details are here: https://fhirdevdays.com/us/startup . Questions? Ask @Vadim Peretokin
